request_process.legal_authority: Chapter 132 of the North Carolina General Statutes
request_process.how_to_request: Written or verbal request to appropriate agency custodian
required_information: Sufficiently specific description of records sought
request_process.agency_response_time: No specific deadline - must respond 'as promptly as possible'
request_process.appeals_process: No formal administrative appeal process; enforcement through court action under NC civil procedure

key_exemptions: Security information that could compromise safety
notable_features: No specific response deadline - 'as promptly as possible' standard
Records presumed public unless specifically exempted
Electronic records management program required for state agencies
Willful destruction of records is Class 1 misdemeanor
